title: Kitsune's Human Play
description: A playful story about Yuki, a fox spirit who transforms into human form to experience human life and culture.

chapters.title: To the Human World
chapters.description: Yuki's first impressions of human village life and her nervousness about being discovered

sentences.道を歩くと、おいしいパンの匂いがした。: As I walked down the street, I smelled delicious bread.
sentences.クンクン、と匂いをかぎたかったけど、人間だから我慢した。: I wanted to sniff around, but I held back because I was human.
sentences.優しい顔のおじいさんが立っていた。: A kind-faced old man was standing there.
sentences.人間の毎日は、すごく面白い。: Human everyday life is so interesting.

sentences.でも、新しいことを知るのは、とってもワクワクする！: But learning new things is so exciting!
sentences.私は、ここでうまくやっていけるかな？: Will I be able to manage here?
